text: Extinct is an upcoming computer-animated adventure comedy film directed by David Silverman, and co-directed by Raymond S. Persi. ==Premise== Two creatures known as Flummels find themselves transported from 1835 to modern day Shanghai. ==Cast== * Adam DeVine as Ed * Rachel Bloom as Op * Zazie Beetz as Dottie * Ken Jeong as Clarance * Jim Jefferies as Burnie * Catherine O'Hara as Alma * Reggie Watts as Hoss * Alex Borstein as Mali ==Production== It was announced in September 2019 that a new animated feature was in production at Cinesite Animation directed by David Silverman with Raymond S. Persi as co- director. The announced cast included Adam DeVine, Rachel Bloom, Zazie Beetz and Ken Jeong.Adam Devine, Rachel Bloom, Zazie Beetz, Ken Jeong Lead Voice Cast Of ‘Extinct’ Animation – Toronto ==References== ==External links== * Category:2020 films Category:Canadian animated feature films Category:Films about time travel Category:Upcoming films Category:Canadian films Category:TriStar Pictures films
title: Extinct (film)
